title: Hebrew G2P Benchmark - Grapheme-to-Phoneme Model Comparison
description: Benchmark comparing Grapheme-to-Phoneme (G2P) models for Hebrew text using IPA transcriptions. Models are evaluated on Word Error Rate (WER), Character Error Rate (CER), and Stress placement accuracy across 100 test sentences.

models.name: Gemini 3 Pro
models.description: Google's Gemini 3 Pro LLM with high thinking level and Google Search grounding

models.name: Gemini 3.1 Pro
models.description: Google's Gemini 3.1 Pro LLM with low thinking level

models.name: Gemini 3.1 Pro (High Thinking)
models.description: Google's Gemini 3.1 Pro LLM with high thinking level

models.name: Claude Opus 4.5
models.description: Anthropic's Claude Opus 4.5 LLM with extended thinking

models.name: Claude Opus 4.6
models.description: Anthropic's Claude Opus 4.6 LLM with extended thinking

models.name: Phonikud
models.description: Dedicated Hebrew G2P model based on fine-tuned transformer architecture

models.name: Goruut
models.description: Rule-based multilingual G2P system written in Go

models.name: Gemma3-G2P
models.description: Google's Gemma 3 model fine-tuned for G2P conversion

models.name: Charsiu
models.description: Multilingual G2P model based on ByT5 small architecture

models.name: ESpeak-NG
models.description: Open-source rule-based speech synthesizer with built-in G2P
